select a.id, a.dpnum, a.update_time, a.title, a.hot, a.price, a.vip_price, b.MAX_URL, b.MINI_URL,a.gwc_num, (select count(*) from a_order_record where AC_INFO_ID=a.id) as yCount, a.AC_CODE from a_commodity_info a,a_picture_address b,a_commodity_nav c where a.del=0 and c.del=0 and a.id=b.AC_INFO_ID and c.code=a.ac_code
and a.id in(${acInfoIds})
select id, update_time, nav_title, nav_short, icon_url, num, type, dpnum, code from a_commodity_nav where del=0 and type=:type and DPNUM=:dpnum order by num asc

SELECT a.id , a.title, a.ac_code, a.content, a.hot, a.price, a.num , a.vip_price, a.dpnum, a.update_time, (select count(*) from a_order_record where AC_INFO_ID=a.id) as yCount, a.gwc_num, b.MAX_URL, b.MINI_URL FROM a_commodity_info a left join a_picture_address b on b.AC_INFO_ID=a.id where a.del = 0 and b.del=0 and a.dpnum=:dpnum and a.ac_code=:code order by a.update_time desc

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.ac_code, a.antistop, a.content, a.hot, a.price, a.VIP_PRICE, a.DPNUM, a.gwc_num, b.MAX_URL, b.MINI_URL FROM a_commodity_info a left join a_picture_address b on a.id=b.AC_INFO_ID WHERE a.del = 0 and b.del=0 and a.DPNUM=:dpnum AND a.title like concat('%',:title,'%') OR a.antistop like concat('%',:title,'%') order by a.update_time desc
